title: feat: add imagen-4, flux-2-dev, grok-video (alpha) via api.airforce
author: voodoohop

gist.headline: Three new ways to dream
gist.blurb: We've unlocked Google's Imagen 4, Flux 2 Dev, and Grok Video for everyone. Plus, a new Alpha badge to help you spot experimental magic.
gist.summary: Integrated Imagen 4, Flux 2 Dev, and Grok Video models via api.airforce, adding a new Alpha stability indicator to the UI.
gist.impact: Creators gain access to state-of-the-art image and video generation models, with clear indicators for experimental features.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot discovering three new creative tools (camera, canvases) in the garden, with a bubbling potion flask symbolizing the 'Alpha' status.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby 8-bit bee mascot inspecting three new magical glowing items in a garden: a retro video camera and two digital canvases. A bubbling pixel potion flask sits nearby. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
